1_1AYyXGe2tuKtFpsC6ALa5qZx1vhnHpKUsz.body: Trac-like service. It would be so useful to have a tracker to activate colaborative projects. Something like this: https://trac.edgewall.org/ where you can profile yourself and be asked for programming tasks or even non programming tasks in real life as to plant some kind of seeds in your land or everything people that knows you could imagine you can do for them. Even it would be great to get supported if you accept any of the tasks proposed to you.
